tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TrafficData (
    date DATE,
    city VARCHAR,
    traffic_volume INT,
    weather_condition VARCHAR,
    road_condition VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE historical_data (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   date DATE,
   traffic_volume INT,
   weather_condition TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_patterns (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   pattern_name TEXT,
   description TEXT,
   importance INT
)

CREATE TABLE predicted_traffic (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   date DATE,
   predicted_volume INT,
   confidence_level FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE infrastructure_updates (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   update_date DATE,
   description TEXT,
   cost DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_trends (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   trend_name TEXT,
   prediction_accuracy FLOAT,
   trend_description TEXT
)
